net.gescobar.jmx
Class Management

java.lang.Object
  net.gescobar.jmx.Management

public final class Management
extends Object

Provides methods to register and unregister objects as JMX MBeans.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary

          Registers an object with the specified name in the default MBeanServer (which is retrieved using the ManagementFactory.getPlatformServer() method).
static void unregister(String name)

Method Detail

register

public static void register(Object object,
                            String name)
                     throws InstanceAlreadyExistsException,
                            ManagementException

Registers an object with the specified name in the default MBeanServer (which is retrieved using the ManagementFactory.getPlatformServer() method).

All the public attributes and methods annotated with ManagedAttribute and ManagedOperation of the object's class (and the classes it descends from) will be exposed. The object must be annotated with ManagedBean.

Parameters:
object - the object that will be exposed as an MBean.
name - the name used to expose the object in the MBeanServer (see http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/management/ObjectName.html for more information).
Throws:
InstanceAlreadyExistsException - if the MBean is already registered.
ManagementException - if there is a problem creating or registering the MBean.

unregister

public static void unregister(String name)
                       throws ManagementException

Unregisters an MBean with the specified name if it exists in the default MBeanServer (which is retrieved using the ManagementFactory.getPlatformServer() method).

Parameters:
name - the name with which the MBean was registered.
Throws:
ManagementException - wraps any unexpected exception unregistering the MBean.

isRegistered

public boolean isRegistered(String name)
                     throws ManagementException
Throws:
ManagementException
